description: Filter by available properties in query params, like this: `api/v2/resources?filter[id]=value&filter[another_property]=value1,value2`. Check our Filtering guide for examples and all about filtering [here](https://developers.myclickfunnels.com/docs/filtering).

id.description: A comma-separated list of Invoice IDs to filter by.

status.description: The status of the invoice to filter by.

invoice_type.description: The type of the invoice to filter by.

invoice_number.description: A comma-separated list of Invoice Numbers to filter by.

external_id.description: A comma-separated list of External IDs to filter by.
